data.description:
Welcome to RoboKO! The virtual reality boxing game that thrusts you into the heart-pounding world of underground robot fightclub! Your robot will follow your boxing movements 1:1 so when you punch, your robot punches (only a lot stronger)! Test your boxing skills against players from around the globe in head-to-head battles or embark on a solo journey to stardom in our single-player career mode. 

Online Multiplayer Mayhem:
Step into the virtual ring and square off against opponents from every corner of the world. RoboKO offers real-time, adrenaline-pumping battles where your every jab, hook, and uppercut can make the difference between victory and defeat. With a seamless online matchmaking system, you'll always find a worthy challenger eager to test their skills.

Single-Player Career Mode:
Are you ready to climb the ranks and hoist the champion's Belt? Start as a rookie robot fighter and rise through the ranks, facing off against increasingly formidable opponents, each with their own unique fighting styles and strategies. 

Customize Your Fighter:
Personalize your robot boxer to make it truly your own. You can customize everything from your robot's colors and patterns to its overall appearance. Stand out in the ring with a one-of-a-kind fighting machine that reflects your style and personality.

Will you and your robot fighter have what it takes? Download RoboKO and claim the title of the undisputed robot boxing champion!!
